Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Harold Melnick Papers
Melnick, Harold
WAG.079
3 Linear Feet (3 boxes)
undated
Scope and Contents
Papers related to NYPD Sergeants Benevolent Association.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Harold Melnick was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Harold Melnick, 1991. The accession number associated with this gift is 1991.015.
Melnick, Harold
